page.title: 18EATING HABITS THEDDINGWORTH
page.content: About twice as many people have their main meal in the evening as those eating at mid-day during the week, but the picture is reversed on Sunday when only half the population eat a main meal in the evening. 25% of households in the village regularly eat a vegetarian meal, including 6 households who are mostly vegetarian. On the other hand about half the households never eat a vegetarian meal. Rice and pasta based meals are more popular, with 60% of households enjoying such dishes regularly or often, and with only 10% never eating rice or pasta. Most people eat both brown and white bread but 10% eat only brown and 15% eat only white bread. More than 40% have a take-away meal regularly or sometimes, and over 60% eat out regularly or sometimes.
